'use client' import { Calendar, Home, Inbox, Search, Settings } from 'lucide-react' import { Sidebar, SidebarContent, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupContent, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarInset, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarProvider, SidebarTrigger, } from '~/registry/miami/ui/sidebar' // Menu items. const items = [ { title: 'Home', url: '#', icon: Home, }, { title: 'Inbox', url: '#', icon: Inbox, }, { title: 'Calendar', url: '#', icon: Calendar, }, { title: 'Search', url: '#', icon: Search, }, { title: 'Settings', url: '#', icon: Settings, }, ] export default function AppSidebar() { return ( Application {items.map(item => ( {item.title} ))}
) }
